Name: Watching Delusion
About the game: Watching Delusion is a grotesque puzzle game where you have to open all of the 'eyes' on the map. It's a simple game using up to six blocks per level, but as the special 'eye' blocks grow, you will gradually fall into the labyrinth.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Watching Delusion? Check out the release date (Aug 3, 2018), developer insights from GooDGooN, and a complete game summary.
